li.p: Sometimes it may be not clear which meta-data files are used for particular editing session. This information can be obtained by calling the Document->Document Properties dialog.

When you change and save the meta-data settings for multiple opened documents of the same type, the last save is the most relevant. To see the saved changes affect the other already opened documents, you must re-open the documents, but not through the recent files list which preserves meta-data settings as they were when closing a document.

If you want to create permanent settings on the Original level, first save the view as user-customized on the Template or No-Template level, and then copy the files to the Serna installation directory manually.
